title: Athletics at the 2019 Pan American Games – Women's discus throw
text:
The women's <a href="discus%20throw">discus throw</a> competition of the <a href="Track%20and%20field">athletics</a> events at the <a href="2019%20Pan%20American%20Games">2019 Pan American Games</a> will take place on the 6 of August at the 2019 Pan American Games Athletics Stadium. The <a href="Athletics%20at%20the%202015%20Pan%20American%20Games%20%E2%80%93%20%20Women%27s%20discus%20throw">defending</a> <a href="Pan%20American%20Games">Pan American Games</a> champion is <a href="Denia%20Caballero">Denia Caballero</a> from <a href="Cuba">Cuba</a>.
